name: Super Mario 64 EX
summary: Super Mario 64 EX (also known as sm64ex) is a fork of the original Super Mario 64 PC Port. This fork was made to be easier to mod, being the later forked to other repositories like Render96 and Super Mario 64 Plus. It has support for many mods like DynOS, Cheater, Mario Odyssey's Moveset and others.
